body:
The following improvements would be nice:
1. It should check for all errors in your command before uninstalling anything.  Eg: if I say `spack uninstall openmpi foobar`, it should tell me that `foobar` is not a valid package name, and NOT uninstall `openmpi`.
2. It should give a summary of what's going to happen  before it does the uninstalls; and (optionally) ask you interactively to confirm.
3. There should be a --recursive option that goes on an uninstall spree.
title: [Feature Request] Improvements to spack uninstall
